title: FS: Old Judge Scrap Pack & N172 Baldwin
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: Old Judge Scrap Pack & N172 Baldwin
posts.post_content:
Prices are net to me & include shipping.

Baldwin --- $135 (SOLD)
Card is skinned but very nice image and no creases. 

OJ Scrap Pack --- $40
Measures 4.75" x 7". Not exactly sure what this is, but what you see is all there is - it is a single piece of paper. OJs weren't issued in these, but this is a large piece and a cool companion image.
